name: fountain flower square
notes:
this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only. you will not receive a physical product.

crochet chart is available in the pdf version of the pattern.

skill level: intermediate

sizes:  4.5" by 4.5"

hook size: us size i/9, 5.5 mm

yarn: samples used category 4 worsted weight yarn

stitches: ch, hdc, puff stitches, dc, sc

pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english.

please note that there is an online version available for free on [stitching-together.com][1]. the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read, printable and ad-free version of the pattern.

[view on etsy][2]


  [1]: https://www.stitching-together.com/flower-crochet-granny-square-pattern-free/
